Author: rtimothyedwards_19428
Content: 512 bytes was the largest of the four GF 5V SRAM macros.  I was thinking of expanding that to 1kB for another macro;  shouldn't be too hard.  But I'll get this one done first.

Author: rtimothyedwards_19428
Content: @urish :  What size is a TT slot on GF180MCU?

Author: 246tnt
Content: But that means in a 2x2 ( 711.20 um x 325.36 um ) you can fit a decent size SRAM and some logic.

Author: rtimothyedwards_19428
Content: The SRAM block is now both DRC and LVS clean.  I will work tomorrow on squeezing out additional space at the bottom and then I will push to the repository.  Again, don't expect timing values at this point in the process.
